Articles.Content:
Ready to build and fly a couple of cool space and aircraft.

Playing vanilla Kerbal up til now, I think I'm halfway trough the tec-tree and prefer to finish it up before installing mods. I've been having plenty fun, especially desingning stuff and thought it'd be a good idea to share some with you. My thread will land on the correct spot shortly, let's hope nothing breaks, might even install some panic parachutes on there
Welcome to the community eLGassi, we're looking forwards to seeing this thread of yours

Well thank you very much, tower control. having stability problems, trying to resolve. whats up with the avatar thingy, found the edit options but only the option to delete is showing. did I miss something?

A few more posts and you'll be a Bottle Rocketeer, and can set your avatar, this is a basic but effective anti-spambot system we all go through as new members

Edited January 29, 2014 by sal_vager
ah, cool. Then I'll have to get down typing. This Thread doesnt land itself

oof! finally got it all save down to the ground. might have busted some tires and maybe some nerves while retyping the whole thing (note to self, make post in offline editor first) but i was finally able to post, and would hereby invite you to take a peek at the Space Plane Hangar 42
